item.title: MLIR Linalg Dialect 以及 Patterns
item.description: 之前的文章介绍了 Vector dialect 及其相关 pattern。 今天我们来看一下上层的 Linalg dialect 以及相关的变换。

item.title: MLIR Linalg Dialect and Patterns
item.description: I explained the Vector dialect and related patterns in the previous blog post. In this one let us look at a layer higher and talk about the Linalg dialect and transformations around it.

item.title: What is Vulkan Compute?
item.description: Vulkan is designed to be both a graphics and compute API. However, there is no formal definition of the compute subset from the Khronos group, the industry consortium behind Vulkan. The unified specification of Vulkan does not help here either as it contains everything, both graphics and compute. Unlike the complicated graphics subset, the compute subset is actually quite straightforward and clean. So in this blog post I try to explain what Vulkan compute is, from my point of view.
